name: RADICAL (itch) (Games For People)
description:
The little flicky square root sign is called a radical. It's a name that offers promise of excitement and rebellion, which is mostly squandered by our education system.

But one critter dares to claim the word for his own!

Solve Reggie the Radical Rabbit's number puzzles revolving around square roots, cube roots and whatever the bigger ones are called.

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2023.

If the embed resolution is too high for your display,
please use the full-screen button in the bottom-right.
